name: go-shp-chrome-extension
description: Chrome Extension for a go lang secure HTTP proxy.

scripts.gen-icon: rsvg-convert -h 128 resources/icon.svg > public/icon.png && rsvg-convert -h 128 resources/icon_off.svg > public/icon_off.png && rsvg-convert -h 128 resources/icon_on.svg > public/icon_on.png
scripts.gen-config-schema: typescript-json-schema --strictNullChecks --noExtraProps --required tsconfig.json ShpConfig -o src/config.schema.json && ajv compile -s src/config.schema.json -o src/config.validator.js && rm src/config.schema.json

author: Yingyu Cheng
